thread.title: Manchester United's Morgan Schneiderlin set for Everton medical ahead of big-money switch
thread.title_full: Manchester United's Morgan Schneiderlin set for Everton medical ahead of big-money switch

author: Samuel Luckhurst
title: Manchester United's Morgan Schneiderlin set for Everton medical ahead of big-money switch
text:
Morgan Schneiderlin is nearing an exit from Manchester United (Photo: Man Utd via Getty) Share Get Manchester United FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Morgan Schneiderlin is set for a medical at Everton as his move from Manchester United edges closer. 
Boss Jose Mourinho made the French midfielder available for transfer this month and he has arrived at Finch Farm ahead of completing what is expected to be a £20m+ transfer. 
It is understood a fee is yet to be agreed between the two clubs but the Manchester Evening News report a breakthrough is close. 
West Brom had an £18m bid rejected for the France international, who underwent additional fitness sessions ahead of the medical, and have been gazumped by Everton. Read More Morgan Schneiderlin has been on the outside looking in for much of the season (Photo: Man Utd via Getty) Schneiderlin has not played for United in nearly two months (Photo: Tom Purslow) He will now reunite with former boss Ronald Koeman at Goodison Park (Photo: Reuters) 
Schneiderlin has not played for United in nearly two months and his last Premier League start came at West Ham in May, when he was substituted at half-time. 
Mourinho was braced for Schneiderlin's and Dutch forward Memphis' departures a month ago. 
Schneiderlin preferred to move to Everton, despite West Brom's interest. Read More
